document_data.caption: A map showing Murghir's Lane and surroundings in the Trades Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Murghir's Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Murghir's Lane''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Murghir's Lane was located in the southwest section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]]. The road branched northeast off of [[Snail Street]] at the border with the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. It continued northeast and ended within a neighborhood just west of the northern reaches of [[Book Street]].
